books.title: Wings of Fire
books.author: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam and Arun Tiwari
books.summary: "Wings of Fire" is the autobiography of Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam, the former President of India and an eminent scientist. The book chronicles his early life, education, and journey from a small town in Rameswaram to becoming a key figure in India's space and missile programs.

books.title: The Immortals of Meluha
books.author: Amish Tripathi
books.summary: "The Immortals of Meluha" is the first book in the Shiva Trilogy, a modern retelling of Indian mythology. The story is set in 1900 BCE in the land of Meluha, where the great emperor Daksha rules. The people of Meluha believe in the legend of a savior, Neelkanth, who will protect them from their enemies, the Chandravanshis.
